alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Independence; Izard; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 12:42PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stone, southwestern Independence, south central Izard, southeastern Van Buren, Cleburne and northeastern Faulkner Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairbanks, or 8 miles south of Fairfield Bay, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Quitman... Cushman... Shirley... Concord... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Croker... Fairbanks... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Woolly Hollow State Park... Bethesda... Guion... Ben... Almond... Parma... Wilburn... Ida... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Faulkner; Independence; Izard; Southeast Van Buren County; Stone
